but two variables are not in one block ... @YorkShen

我也遇到了这个问题
I also have this problem.

this issue is not solved. please reopen
e.g.  the net api return me a attribute string, some words needs highlight,richtext can't solve this problem.

当后台返回一个数据，里面有些字段需要高亮显示的时候，richtext 就处理不了了。

@YorkShen

> > Does it work well if it's higher than API 19?
> 
> no,but has different performance,when my finger touch down and move a little distance,the refresh will pull down.
The issue has been confirmed,we will find a way to solve it.
这个问题的原因是没初始化完成，就去调用！
note that this pull breaks the ios sdk build for me https://github.com/apache/incubator-weex/issues/2673
Already fixed  @c0decafe

As release/0.26 passed two rounds vote and will be published soon, the code on release/0.26 won't be changed.

However, we fixed this issue when merge code into master branch.
I also have this problem! I don't know how to repair it.

@lucky-chen We have tested the weex loading issue with android app bundle in .26 version of weex. We could see that it is still present. We have tested it with custom .so loader, still its not working. 

https://issuetracker.google.com/issues/125164369

Without using the below flag in android the pages are not getting loaded. 
android.bundle.enableUncompressedNativeLibs=false
I had the same problem.

Warnings
:warning: No Changelog changes!
Messages
:book: danger test finished.

Generated by :no_entry_sign: dangerJS

This issue is still reproducible in weexVersion 0.26.0. Also "toLocaleTimeString" is also not working.
It also breaks onclick and appear events.
http://dotwe.org/vue/f748b0cee3991522a66d4376b66a4f2a

Just for clarity:
> When I click element its class "flickers" (all except first one)

Found that "first" - is initiated state (in example: currentIndex == 0)

if we change currentIndex (to 2, for example), then the same situation will be occurred, but with row "C":

http://dotwe.org/vue/ae2c4e414981e13a33109974db229c67

As there is no JNI environment in subprocess, the C++ -> JAVA message channel will not work without IPC.

However, you can just print log by `console.error` or`console.warn`, `console.info` instead of `console.log` in weex 0.26

We shall make IPC chanel in next version to make `console.log` work as expected.
Please check your code, the message is pretty straight-forward.
We have fixed the problem in 0.26, please upgrade.

Check your code, thanks.

The message is pretty straight-forward. You are **Attempted to assign to readonly property**.

First of all, please describe your question with English as there are many users/developers are not able to speak Chinese. If you want get help from their hands, English please.

Weex only supports **x86**, **armeabi-v7a** and **arm64-v8a** for now.

I think we can support **x86-64** in next release.
I think you need to check your network, thanks.

There is a missing commit in `release/0.26` branch.

Due to the time consuming of Apache release procedure, there are three options:
* Wait for next release, which shall be scheduled in August.
* Compile from source of master branch.
* Be the release manager and do a release based on master branch.

First of all, please describe your question in English as there are many developers/users are not able to speak Chinese. If you'd like get help from them, English please.

As for this problem, I think it's worthy to have a look.

You might understand such stacktrace is useless in developers's perspective.

Please at least upload **data/user/0/ /app_crash/crash_dump.log** in the stacktrace.
It seems like a bug, we will look into that.
Duplicate with #2657

I don't see any problem here.

Change `animating` to false when you finishes the loading in JS.

If you remain the targetSdkVersion as it is(26) and run it on Android Q device, you will see everything is fine.

Maybe Android Q change their C++ memory permission mechanism, maybe this is a bug of Android Q itself. Either way, Weex won't change targetAPI(neither do you, I think) or any code for this issue before Android Q release. After all, it works well on Android Q emulator.
It seems like a bug, we will look into it.

> Weex may not render as expected if you need a smooth transition between different border-radius or border-width on adjoining sides.

As it's said in the [documentation](https://weex.apache.org/docs/styles/common-styles.html#box-model), this is the issue of Android system itself, and there is not much we can do.

Anyway, I will look into the `border-width` and `border-radius` problem, but this issue may not be fixed. As for `border-color: rgba(0,0,0,.5);`, please don't use alpha, there is nothing we can do to combine alpha, border-width, border-radius in Android View system.

I think we have fixed the problem on master branch.

Check it out, thanks.

First of all, please use English to describe your problems as there are many developers are not able to speak Chinese.

Here is instructions:
1. Follow the issue template and provide your demo in [dot.we](http://dotwe.org/vue)
2. You can reopen the issue after completed your demo as **I only response to issues that are open**.
The web page is down.
Thanks.

| |
Herrick
|
|
herrick_xu@163.com
|

confirmed
master has no this issue
master branch also has this issue

图中第二个item应该展示预期年化，但是没有展示出来，数据本身是OK的。
页面刷新重新绘制都没有，只有退出页面再次进入才可以。
复现概率偏小
When setting animating to false and then changing to true, the arrow will disappear after the first turn, and when the initial setting is true, the arrow will always exist.
@nikkulshrestha Can you provide demo case?  such as [link](http://editor.weex.io/p/Hanks10100/css-watermelon) ,so i can reproduce and debug
if you are in debug mode , then will print much log ,  try [close log](https://weex.apache.org/docs/modules/console-log.html#switchloglevel) ,and test
Thanks @lucky-chen, we will check release build also.

You shall understand there is nothing we can do before reproducing it.

Provide the log information you have and reopen the issue. **I only response to issues that are open**.

1. Please upgrade to 0.26. Even if it is a bug, there is nothing we can do on such an old version.
2. Provide a demo. We can't fix a bug before reproduce it.
@nikkulshrestha  provide a demo, so i can debug and found the problem

@nikkulshrestha  you can change branch with master ,and  build new sdk with this

```
-./gradlew weex_sdk:clean weex_sdk:assembleRelease PbuildRuntimeApi=false  --info

```

or change build.gradle 

```
 def buildRuntimeApi = project.hasProperty('buildRuntimeApi') ? project.property('buildRuntimeApi') : false
```

then test
All the registers from `r6` to `r9` is null, which is almost impossible. Any JS file you can shared? Otherwise there is nothing I can do, as almost all the register has zero value.
你看到的不是weex sdk的一部分，算是阿里的一个商业产品的吧http://emas.weex.io/zh/community/biz-emas.html

The log is pretty straightforward, you are missing `ABI`. Add your `ABI` first.

FYI, `weex create` is never part of Apache Weex as it explained in the document, you should not ask question in the right place.

I will just close the issue.

@YorkShen 同一个工程，SDK降到0.24版本，就不会弹这个错误！
希望能给个具体的解决方法！谢谢！

find the problem   https://github.com/apache/incubator-weex/pull/2736 ,and will fix in next release verison 
@nikkulshrestha
@lucky-chen - Please share the ETA for next release.
setViewPortWidth Demo: http://dotwe.org/vue/db55ace59f716bbe58f89dcfd3bf1fc7
The check rules are described in https://github.com/apache/incubator-weex/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#publish-your-change
我才用了另外一个链接的配置weex的代理的方法也没有奏效
This issue is fixed in #2738
@YorkShen @Darin726 hello, is there any solution?

because weex-playground can't build success.
so the check(ios test) failed.
this is what we acutally want.

Hi @lucky-chen - For now we are using 0.26.1.3-SNAPSHOT sdk version for our project. It is working fine on 64 bit devices. But we have experienced the 10-15% increase in rendering time on 32 bit devices. Request your support in this context.

我是打算用层级不同 叠加一个 奈何 不支持 z-index 就很难受
Your Weex SDK may be not latest version. This bug has been fixed.

> Your Weex SDK may be not latest version. This bug has been fixed.

ok  I'll give it a try.
@vipulgupta29 ok,i will check with this demo : http://dotwe.org/vue/3c1dca8c042ebffb32d2b7be86420012

@YorkShen  We've had this problem too many times.So we updated to version 26.But I don't know if it will be solved.Sometimes some icons or views don't show up, and sometimes lists repeat.This is a very serious problem. Every day, customers complain about the instability of our system and occasionally show a lack of it. They mistakenly think it's a data problem.The trigger probability is estimated to be about 3%, but there is nothing we can do about it.I'm sure if you open a weex-built software for a whole day, it will appear 2-3 times.

@YorkShen Today, I try to raise our version to 26. I don't know if it can solve this problem. But 26 has a very serious problem. Another friend raised a question: when the page loads, there will be component jump, sometimes from the top, sometimes from the bottom, about 100 ms later, it will jump back to the target location. The performance of the mobile phone is not questioned. Question, and every cell phone can be reproduced

Weex 0.26 already supports 64 bits.

If you are not happy with 0.26, you can 
* Compile from source.
* Host a release under the [procedure](https://weex.apache.org/community/release-procedure.html)
If you use third-party plugin, please report issues to their repo, not here.
There is certainly no version `2.0.0-beta.31`. All the version we have is listed [here](https://weex.apache.org/download/download.html). If some third-party provides version, ask them, not here.

There is no such version called `2.0.0-beta.31`. All the version we have currently is listed [here](https://weex.apache.org/download/download.html). If some third-parties provide you the version, ask them, not here.
Please check your network, we are not able to help fixing your network problem.
`PatternLock` is not a part of weex, I am not sure why the page exsits. I will delete it anyway.
